title: Ketu Transit in the 7th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the seventh house brings detachment in partnerships and a reassessment of commitment patterns. You may feel less inclined toward dependency or constant validation through others. Relationships become quieter and more selective, emphasizing authenticity over formality. While emotional distance or confusion can arise, honest communication and clear boundaries help maintain balance.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Reduced need for validation through others

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Less attachment to labels or rituals

closing: This transit refines partnerships through detachment. Authentic connection replaces obligation.
